sqlMap.sql: SELECT a.ID, a.BB_ID, a.SMBO_ID, a.POSTS_ID, a.CONTENT, a.CONT_GOOD, a.CONT_BAD, a.REPLY_ID, a.GRADE_ID, a.CREATE_USER_NAME, a.CREATE_USER_ID, a.CREATE_DATE, a.DEL, b.photo_path as imgPath FROM bbs_reply a left join sys_user b on a.CREATE_USER_ID=b.id WHERE a.del = 0 and b.del=0 and a.posts_id=:id ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
